adrFormatAddress: 1588 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: I have been going there about 6 months now.  My hair was falling out because I was coloring it at home and mixing formula wrong. Since I have been coming here my hair grew back. I  am very happy with the results and the staff is great too.

text.text: I have been going there about 6 months now.  My hair was falling out because I was coloring it at home and mixing formula wrong. Since I have been coming here my hair grew back. I  am very happy with the results and the staff is great too.

originalText.text:
Seriously, STAY AWAY. The price might be tempting, but do not do it. Completely unimpressed. Garbage customer service. I went in and asked for the same highlights I have always gotten at other salons and they kept insisting that it was not highlights, but all over color, when highlights is the only color treatment process I have ever gotten… It was raining and the stylist was like “why is your hair wet? You don’t have an umbrella?” Then seemed annoyed.

I showed photos of my highlighted hair at another salon, but they wouldn’t do it. The stylist claimed to be the manager and kept offering to reschedule my appointment because we were starting late, but I was there on time... What would the point of that be? She just didn’t want to do it. I took time off work and it was a complete waste of time. So please do not go there and do not waste yours.

You don’t have an umbrella?” Then seemed annoyed.

I showed photos of my highlighted hair at another salon, but they wouldn’t do it. The stylist claimed to be the manager and kept offering to reschedule my appointment because we were starting late, but I was there on time... What would the point of that be? She just didn’t want to do it. I took time off work and it was a complete waste of time. So please do not go there and do not waste yours.

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience in their Williamsburg location, but not here in UWS. It was before 6pm and there were 3 other customers. I got seated but no one offered to hang my coat.  The technician began applying the colors and I had to stop her because I knew the hair dyes would splash onto my coat.  Another technician came over and hung the coat and we proceeded with the colors application.  When I was ready to rinse another technician took over because mine got off from work.  The lack of greeting and communication between me and the staff is unprofessional.  I will not come back to this location.

text.text: I had a fantastic experience in their Williamsburg location, but not here in UWS. It was before 6pm and there were 3 other customers. I got seated but no one offered to hang my coat.  The technician began applying the colors and I had to stop her because I knew the hair dyes would splash onto my coat.  Another technician came over and hung the coat and we proceeded with the colors application.  When I was ready to rinse another technician took over because mine got off from work.  The lack of greeting and communication between me and the staff is unprofessional.  I will not come back to this location.

originalText.text:
THIS PLACE NEEDS SOMEONE WHO KNOWS MATHS. My total bill was $112 and even after 25% on visit, they charged me $104 instead $84 just for roots touch and gloss (which I didn’t need but was kind of forced). Very high prices and does not even help in drying hair after the wash. That’s the basics.
Staff needs to be more trained, friendly and professionals.
You’ll not feel pampered or loved but rather in a thought that you should have gone somewhere else for this service. Very disappointing experience.
They didn’t even take my permission to click my photos of head & hair but just clicked and saved in their software for their database. Total scam!

originalText.text: Love this place! I’ve been going for some time now, I actually said hi to all the colorist and they are fantastic. I want to shout out Celia for this review she did my hair from start to finish today and I love it. She was so gentle and detailed and everything you want when someone is taking care of you & doing ya hair.
